name: SnowReport
0:
”Alexa, ask snow report about Keystone weather”
”Alexa, ask snow report about Beaver Creek conditions”
”Alexa, ask snow report about Vail snow report”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snow report
des:
Get snow conditions and weather for your favorite resort. 
Use this Alexa skill to plan you ski or snowboarding trip to enjoy the best weather, best fresh snow and have a great time. 
You can ask things like

Keystone snow report
What is weather in Vail
Breckenridge ski conditions
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
